sourcesContent:
export const translations = {
  en: {
    // Header
    'app.title': 'AI Career Impact Analyzer',
    'app.subtitle': 'Explore how AI will transform your profession',
    
    // Job Search
    'search.title': 'Find Your Profession',
    'search.placeholder': 'Search for your profession...',
    'search.noResults': 'No results found',
    
    // Job Details
    'jobDetails.title': 'AI Impact Analysis',
    
    // Countdown Clock
    'countdown.title': 'Profession Automation Countdown',
    'countdown.predictedYear': 'Predicted Automation Year:',
    'countdown.automationProbability': 'Automation Probability:',
    'countdown.years': 'Years',
    'countdown.months': 'Months',
    'countdown.days': 'Days',
    'countdown.hours': 'Hours',
    'countdown.minutes': 'Min',
    'countdown.seconds': 'Sec',
    'countdown.highUrgency': 'High Urgency',
    'countdown.mediumUrgency': 'Medium Urgency',
    'countdown.low': 'Low',
    'countdown.medium': 'Medium',
    'countdown.high': 'High',
    
    // Probability Meter
    'probability.title': 'AI Impact Level',
    'probability.highRisk': 'High Risk',
    'probability.mediumRisk': 'Medium Risk',
    'probability.lowRisk': 'Low Risk',
    'probability.highRiskDesc': 'This profession is highly likely to be fully automated by AI. Consider transitioning or upgrading skills.',
    'probability.mediumRiskDesc': 'This profession may be partially automated. Adapt to working with AI assistance.',
    'probability.lowRiskDesc': 'This profession has minimal AI impact in the short term, but stay aware of technological trends.',
    
    // Timeline
    'timeline.title': 'Career & AI Development Milestones',
    'timeline.year': 'Year',
    'timeline.event': 'Event',
    
    // Job Trends
    'trends.title': 'Career Trend Analysis',
    
    // Adaptation Strategies
    'adaptation.title': 'Adaptation Strategies',
    'adaptation.skillsTitle': 'Recommended Skills',
    'adaptation.coursesTitle': 'Recommended Courses',
    'adaptation.alternativeTitle': 'Alternative Careers',
    'adaptation.skillsDesc': 'Develop these skills to remain competitive:',
    'adaptation.coursesDesc': 'Consider these learning opportunities:',
    'adaptation.alternativeDesc': 'Related fields with lower automation risk:',
    
    // 3D Job Icon
    'jobIcon.lowRisk': 'Low Risk',
    'jobIcon.mediumRisk': 'Medium Risk',
    'jobIcon.highRisk': 'High Risk',
    'jobIcon.loading': 'Loading job visualization...',
    
    // Alert Overlay
    'alert.title': 'Important Notice',
    'alert.message': 'This tool provides projections based on current AI trends and research. Actual timelines may vary. Use this information as one of many inputs for your career planning.',
    'alert.button': 'I Understand',
    
    // Risk Levels
    'risk.low': 'Low Risk',
    'risk.medium': 'Medium Risk',
    'risk.high': 'High Risk',
    
    // Language Switcher
    'language.switch': 'Switch to Chinese',
  },
  zh: {
    // 页眉
    'app.title': 'AI职业影响分析器',
    'app.subtitle': '探索AI将如何改变您的职业',
    
    // 职业搜索
    'search.title': '查找您的职业',
    'search.placeholder': '搜索您的职业...',
    'search.noResults': '未找到结果',
    
    // 职业详情
    'jobDetails.title': 'AI影响分析',
    
    // 倒计时时钟
    'countdown.title': '职业自动化倒计时',
    'countdown.predictedYear': '预计自动化年份:',
    'countdown.automationProbability': '自动化概率:',
    'countdown.years': '年',
    'countdown.months': '月',
    'countdown.days': '日',
    'countdown.hours': '时',
    'countdown.minutes': '分',
    'countdown.seconds': '秒',
    'countdown.highUrgency': '高度紧迫',
    'countdown.mediumUrgency': '中度紧迫',
    'countdown.low': '低',
    'countdown.medium': '中',
    'countdown.high': '高',
    
    // 概率仪表
    'probability.title': 'AI影响程度',
    'probability.highRisk': '高度风险',
    'probability.mediumRisk': '中度风险',
    'probability.lowRisk': '低度风险',
    'probability.highRiskDesc': '该职业极有可能被AI完全自动化，建议尽快转型或提升技能。',
    'probability.mediumRiskDesc': '该职业有较大可能被部分自动化，需要适应AI辅助工作模式。',
    'probability.lowRiskDesc': '该职业短期内受AI影响较小，但仍需关注技术发展趋势。',
    
    // 时间线
    'timeline.title': '职业与AI发展里程碑预测',
    
    // 职业趋势
    'trends.title': '职业趋势分析',
    
    // 适应策略
    'adaptation.title': '适应策略',
    'adaptation.skillsTitle': '推荐技能',
    'adaptation.coursesTitle': '推荐课程',
    'adaptation.alternativeTitle': '替代职业',
    'adaptation.skillsDesc': '培养这些技能以保持竞争力:',
    'adaptation.coursesDesc': '考虑这些学习机会:',
    'adaptation.alternativeDesc': '自动化风险较低的相关领域:',
    
    // 3D职业图标
    'jobIcon.lowRisk': '低风险',
    'jobIcon.mediumRisk': '中等风险',
    'jobIcon.highRisk': '高风险',
    'jobIcon.loading': '加载职业可视化...',
    
    // 警告覆盖层
    'alert.title': '重要提示',
    'alert.message': '此工具基于当前AI趋势和研究提供预测。实际时间线可能会有所不同。请将此信息作为职业规划的众多输入之一。',
    'alert.button': '我明白了',
    
    // 风险等级
    'risk.low': '低风险',
    'risk.medium': '中等风险',
    'risk.high': '高风险',
    
    // 语言切换器
    'language.switch': '切换为英文',
  }
};
